sn22.54:1.4: Mulabijam, khandhabijam, aggabijam, phalubijam, bijabijanneva pancamam.
sn22.54:1.5: Imani cassu, bhikkhave, panca bijajatani akhandani aputikani avatatapahatani saradani sukhasayitani, pathavi ca nassa, apo ca nassa;
sn22.54:1.6: api numani, bhikkhave, panca bijajatani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyyun”ti?
sn22.54:1.8: “Imani cassu, bhikkhave, panca bijajatani akhandani …pe… sukhasayitani, pathavi ca assa, apo ca assa;
sn22.54:1.9: api numani, bhikkhave, panca bijajatani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyyun”ti?
sn22.54:1.11: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, pathavidhatu, evam catasso vinnanatthitiyo datthabba.
sn22.54:1.12: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, apodhatu, evam nandirago datthabbo.
sn22.54:1.13: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, panca bijajatani, evam vinnanam saharam datthabbam.
sn22.54:2.1: Rupupayam, bhikkhave, vinnanam titthamanam tittheyya, ruparammanam rupappatittham nandupasecanam vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyya.
sn22.54:2.2: Vedanupayam va, bhikkhave, vinnanam titthamanam tittheyya …pe…
sn22.54:2.3: sannupayam va, bhikkhave, vinnanam titthamanam tittheyya …pe…
sn22.54:2.4: sankharupayam va, bhikkhave, vinnanam titthamanam tittheyya, sankhararammanam sankharappatittham nandupasecanam vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyya.
sn22.54:3.2: ‘ahamannatra rupa annatra vedanaya annatra sannaya annatra sankharehi vinnanassa agatim va gatim va cutim va upapattim va vuddhim va virulhim va vepullam va pannapessami’ti, netam thanam vijjati.
sn22.54:4.1: Rupadhatuya ceva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rago pahino hoti.
sn22.54:4.2: Ragassa pahana vocchijjatarammanam patittha vinnanassa na hoti.
sn22.54:4.6: vinnanadhatuya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rago pahino hoti.
sn22.54:4.7: Ragassa pahana vocchijjatarammanam patittha vinnanassa na hoti.
sn22.54:4.9: Vimuttatta thitam. Thitatta santusitam. Santusitatta na paritassati. Aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
